meanings.sent1: She enjoys liquoring her coffee on cold mornings.
meanings.sent2: The bartender is liquoring up the cocktails for the party.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally spilled the liquor while liquoring his drink.
meanings.sent4: The chef was liquoring the sauce with a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly liquored pastries filled the bakery.

meanings.definition: The act of adding liquor to something.
meanings.sent1: The liquoring of the punch made it a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of liquoring from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The liquoring of the cake was the highlight of the baking class.
meanings.sent4: The secret to the delicious flavor was the careful liquoring of the sauce.
meanings.sent5: The liquoring of the cocktail added a special touch to the evening.
